cron job queue system
description:
Implement cron job queue system to prevent jobs from being skipped when session is busy.

Currently: Cron jobs are skipped if session.isRunning
Goal: Queue pending cron jobs and execute them when session becomes idle

Tasks:
- [ ] Add pendingCronJobs queue to scheduler.ts (Array<{schedule, timestamp}>)
- [ ] Modify executeScheduledPrompt: push to queue if session busy
- [ ] Add processQueuedJobs() function to execute queued jobs
- [ ] Hook into session completion to call processQueuedJobs()
- [ ] Add queue status to /cron command output
- [ ] Test: schedule job while session busy, verify it executes after
